name: Utopia (itch) (studiokaboom)
description:
Utopia is a Google cardboard game in which you explore an over-world and complete the many different levels as you find them. It was created as a proof of concept companion app for a children's book. Tap the screen when looking at the tele-pods to teleport to them, and tap the screen at the mirror and elevators to enter different levels.

This link shows a race track level that could not be fully completed and implemented on time -
